ch.supertomcat.bh.gui.update

Interface UpdateListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BH

    public interface UpdateListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateWindowClosed(boolean updateRunned, boolean updateSuccessfull)
      Update-Window was closed If an update was downloaded and installed updateRunned is true otherwise false.
      void updateWindowOpened()
      Update-Window was opened and will be open until updateWindowClosed-Method is called

    • Method Detail

      • updateWindowOpened

        void updateWindowOpened()
        Update-Window was opened and will be open until updateWindowClosed-Method is called

      • updateWindowClosed

        void updateWindowClosed(boolean updateRunned,
                      boolean updateSuccessfull)
        Update-Window was closed If an update was downloaded and installed updateRunned is true otherwise false. updateSuccessfull is true if the update was successfull otherwise it will be false.
        Parameters:
        updateRunned - Update runned
        updateSuccessfull - Update successfull
